entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
